id.title: ID
id.description: Use to identify a specific query whose results you want to include or exclude from display on LGTM.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: Use to specify a single level of severity (error, warning or recommendation) for queries whose results you want to include or exclude from display.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Use to specify one or more tags for queries whose results you want to include or exclude from display.

description: Configuration file for lgtm, for continuous security analysis.

path_classifiers.title: Path Classifiers
path_classifiers.description: Defines the tag that you want to modify. Usually this is a built-in tag, but you can define your own tags.

additionalProperties.description: Classify files on this path with the parent tag.

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description: Do not classify files on this path with the parent tag.

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description: Hide the results for queries with the specified properties.

include.title: Include
include.description: Show the results for queries with the specified properties.

prepare.title: Prepare
prepare.description: Customizable step used by all languages.

packages.title: Packages
packages.description: One or more packages to install.

after_prepare.title: After Prepare
after_prepare.description: Customizable step used by all languages.

before_index.title: Before Index
before_index.description: Customizable step used by all languages.

index.title: Index
index.description: Customizable step used by all languages.

all_solutions.title: All Solutions
all_solutions.description: Specify that all project or solution files should be used for extraction.

buildless.title: Buildless
buildless.description: Specify whether or not to extract the codebase without building the code.

arguments.title: Arguments
arguments.description: Specify a list of additional arguments to dotnet build.

version.title: Version
version.description: Specify the version of the .NET Core SDK to use.

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description: Specify a list of files and folders to exclude from extraction. Each path is specified by defining paths relative to LGTM_SRC.

filetypes.title: Filetypes
filetypes.description: Specify additional file types to extract.

include.title: Include
include.description: Specify a list of files and folders to scan for files to extract.

java_version.title: Java Version
java_version.description: Specify the Java version required to build the project.

maven.title: Maven
maven.description: Specify Maven settings to use by specifying one or more of the maven subproperties detailed below.

settings_file.title: Settings File
settings_file.description: Specify the path (absolute or relative) of a Maven settings file to use.

toolchains_file.title: Toolchains File
toolchains_file.description: Specify the path of a Maven toolchains file to use.

arguments.title: Arguments
arguments.description: Specify a list of additional arguments to MSBuild.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Specify the MSBuild configuration to use, for example, debug or release.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: Specify the platform to target, for example: x86, x64, or Any CPU.

nuget_restore.title: NuGet Restore
nuget_restore.description: Specify whether or not to perform a NuGet restore for extraction.

solution.title: Solution
solution.description: Specify a list of one or more project or solution files for extraction.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: pecify how TypeScript files should be extracted.

xml_mode.title: XML Mode
xml_mode.description: Specify how XML files should be extracted.

configure.title: Configure
configure.description: Customizable step used only by C/C++ extraction.

command.title: Command
command.description: Override the default process by specifying a list of commands to run to generate the build configuration.

python_setup.title: Python Setup
python_setup.description: This step is used only by Python blocks. It sets up the Python interpreter and virtual environment, ready for the index step to extract the codebase.

exclude_requirements.title: Exclude Requirements
exclude_requirements.description: Specify packages to exclude from extraction/analysis.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.description: Specify a list of pip packages to install. If any of these packages cannot be installed, the extraction will fail.

requirements_files.title: Requirement Files
requirements_files.description: Specify a list of requirements text files to use to set up the environment, or false for none.

setup_py.title: Setup Python
setup_py.description: Specify a setup.py file to use to set up the environment, or false for none.

version.title: Version
version.description: Override the version of the Python interpreter used for setup and extraction.
